variables.name: ex
variables.comment: * The SQLException that the driver will throw to the * application when an error occurs and the pooled connection is no * longer usable. * @serial

variables.name: serialVersionUID
variables.comment:
* Private serial version unique ID to ensure serialization
   * compatibility.

methods.name: public SQLException getSQLException()
methods.comment:
*

Retrieves the SQLException for this * ConnectionEvent object. May be null. * * @return the SQLException about to be thrown or null
